name: XRViewport.x
description: The read-only XRViewport interface's x property indicates the offset from the left edge of the destination surface (typically a XRWebGLLayer to the left edge of the viewport within the surface into which WebXR content is to be rendered.

refs.name: WebXR Device API
refs.description: The definition of 'XRViewport.x' in the 'WebXR Device API' specification.
